ValidationRule.description: If the status of the case is changed to Test Complete - Pending Release, there must be a date in the delivery date field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $RecordType.Name = "COE Submission Case Record Type" && ISPICKVAL( Status, "Test Complete - Pending Release") && ISBLANK( Delivery_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If testing is complete you must enter a delivery date field
